dbd_mermaid:
erDiagram
  ACCOUNT {
    string id PK
    string user_id FK
    string name
    decimal balance
    datetime created_at
    datetime updated_at
  }
  TRANSACTION {
    string id PK
    string account_id FK
    string type
    decimal amount
    string description
    datetime created_at
  }
  USER {
    string id PK
    string email
    string password_hash
    string full_name
    boolean is_active
    datetime created_at
    datetime updated_at
  }
  USER ||--o{ ACCOUNT : owns
  ACCOUNT ||--o{ TRANSACTION : has
api_mermaid:
flowchart LR
  Client -->|GET /users| UsersAPI
  Client -->|POST /users| UsersAPI
  Client -->|GET /users/id| UsersAPI
  Client -->|GET /accounts| AccountsAPI
  Client -->|POST /accounts| AccountsAPI
  Client -->|GET /accounts/id| AccountsAPI
  Client -->|PUT /accounts/id| AccountsAPI
  Client -->|DELETE /accounts/id| AccountsAPI
  Client -->|GET /accounts/id/transactions| TransactionsAPI
  Client -->|POST /transactions| TransactionsAPI
  Client -->|GET /transactions/id| TransactionsAPI
stories: As a user, I can register with email and password so I can access the system.
As a user, I can list all my accounts to see my financial overview.
As a user, I can create a new account to organize my finances.
As a user, I can view account details including current balance.
As a user, I can update account information like name.
As a user, I can delete an account I no longer need.
As a user, I can see all transactions for a specific account.
As a user, I can create a new transaction (deposit or withdrawal).
As a user, I can view transaction details.
